description:
Alex is disgruntled by seeing  Sanae being overly happy about Squid Girl`s visit 
that day. When she finally arrives, he bites her in the leg.
Seeing that, Eiko suggests that Squid Girl takes Alex on a walk.
One morning, when Squid Girl is taking a walk on the beach, she sees kids 
gathering and moving synchronized to strange music. 
Convinced that it must be some sort of ritual or brainwashing, she can`t get
the movements out of her head. 
When Gorou sees with what kind of ease Squid Girl retrieves Takeru`s ball 
that was washed away by the tides, he asks her if she wants to become a 
life saver.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How About A Squiddle Walk?! / Time To Squidzercise?! / Wanna Lend A Helping Tentacle?!
Ist das kein Spaziergang? / Sind das keine Übungen? / Willst du nicht helfen?
Si on se promenait ? / Si on faisait de la gym ? / Si je devenais sauveteur ?
散歩しなイカ!? / 体操しなイカ!? / 助けなイカ!?
